<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/templates"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds files with the IDs specified in the request to the template list.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>
